title: Pity me not - function of final couplet

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the function of the final two lines (13-14) in the context of the poem as a whole?

choices.label: They answer a question posed in previous lines.
They resolve the dilemma faced by the speaker.
They reiterate the speaker’s initial assertion.
They assert the true nature of the speaker’s misfortune.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
